work.summary: â€¢ Was part of a dedicated team of highly skilled React Native software developers, where I was task with building specific screens by writing scalable, documented, high performance codes in React native mainly using functional components and also some light code testing with JEST  before deployment.

â€¢ Worked with the software team to build software to support the company's hardware products. 
â€¢ Designed, developed and maintained the front-end application for the company's project using ReactJS, TypeScript and Material UI. 
â€¢ Developed web services for user and order management using Flask.

â€¢ Worked as a Freelancer where I Created, Customized and deployed high performance website of small businesses Using Both Static HTML, CSS and JavaScript as well As other javascript Framework like React. I alsoa at times implemented my Knowledge of SEO to makes these websites show up and  rank high in various search engine like Google. And used Google analytics and metrics to define and monitor success.
